entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle late this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
